DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare two different saphenous vein cannulation technique ; real-time ultrasound image-guided technique ( Ultrasound group ) vs. traditional landmark technique ( Landmark group ) .
DOC.brief_title: Saphenous Vein Cannulation Infants Small Children
DOC.criteria: 1 . Pediatric patient undergo schedule surgery require venous cannulation . 2 . Term neonates child < 4 year old weigh > /= 3 kg 1 . Patient visible saphenous vein 2 . Patient detectable saphenous vein ultrasound 3 . Patient skin wound infection around puncture site 4 . Patient recent venous puncture puncture site ( less 1 month ) 5 . Patient thrombus saphenous vein hematoma formation around vein detect ultrasound . 6 . Patient emergency surgery
